extract_crowns_data

Source: vignettes/extract_crowns_data.Rmd
extract_crowns_data.Rmd
library(managecrownsdata)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
library(sf)
library(DT)
library(terra)

Extracting rgb crowns data requires rgb mosaics and a crown delineation shapefile. The crowns file must be import as an sf object using the functions or . The full paths for the rgb mosaics must be within a vector. The dates of the mosaics, the site name and the crs could be specify. Dates must be a vector of characters ‘yyyymmdd’ matching with the rgb paths order.

If dates, site name and crs are not specify, they will be extract from the the mosaics files.

crownsFile <- sf::st_read(file.path(system.file(package="managecrownsdata"), 'crowns/Bouamir_crowns.gpkg'))

rgb_paths <- list.files(file.path(system.file(package="managecrownsdata"), 'rgb/'), full.names = TRUE)

To check if the crown file is well formatted for the package functions.

check_crownsFile(crownsFile = crownsFile)
#> ##########     VARIABLES CHECK     ##########
#> -                                           -
#> -- ERROR --  :   geometry variable missing or not well named
#> --- OK ----  :   id
#> --- OK ----  :   family
#> --- OK ----  :   genus
#> --- OK ----  :   species
#> --- OK ----  :   plot_name
#> --- OK ----  :   code_sp
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########           CRS           ##########
#> -                                           -
#> CRS : WGS 84 / UTM zone 33N
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########   DUPLICATED ID CHECK   ##########
#> -                                           -
#> --- OK ----  :  There is no duplicated id

Do the modifications

crownsFile <- crownsFile %>% dplyr::rename(geometry = geom)

All the check are ‘OK’

check_crownsFile(crownsFile = crownsFile)
#> ##########     VARIABLES CHECK     ##########
#> -                                           -
#> --- OK ----  :   geometry
#> --- OK ----  :   id
#> --- OK ----  :   family
#> --- OK ----  :   genus
#> --- OK ----  :   species
#> --- OK ----  :   plot_name
#> --- OK ----  :   code_sp
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########           CRS           ##########
#> -                                           -
#> CRS : WGS 84 / UTM zone 33N
#> -                                           -
#> -                                           -
#> ##########   DUPLICATED ID CHECK   ##########
#> -                                           -
#> --- OK ----  :  There is no duplicated id

Visualize data before extraction


x <- terra::rast(rgb_paths[1])

terra::plotRGB(
   x,
   main = 'img1',
   axes = T,
   mar = 2
)

base::plot(crownsFile$geometry,
           border = "red",
           lwd = 2,
           add = TRUE)
terra::text(terra::vect(crownsFile), labels="id", col = 'blue', cex = 2)
